list.functionality: Get the details of a File
list.output: Please give me an example of how to use the endpoint GetDetailsOfFileById from 1Password Connect.

list.functionality: Update a subset of Item attributes
list.description:
Applies a modified [RFC6902 JSON Patch](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6902) document to an Item or ItemField. This endpoint only supports `add`, `remove` and `replace` operations.

When modifying a specific ItemField, the ItemField's ID in the `path` attribute of the operation object: `/fields/{fieldId}`
list.output: Hey, tell me how to update a subset of item attributes with the 1Password Connect.
